programme.title: Grace: Sem Filtros
programme.desc: Aos 18 anos, Grace é uma cantora gospel de grande sucesso na sua igreja. Um dia, é convidada para tentar uma carreira de ídolo pop e ser a nova Katy Perry. Grace parte para Los Angeles, onde as suas crenças serão testadas no concorrido mundo do espetáculo.

programme.title: Todos ao Monte
programme.desc: Dois ex-namorados reencontram-se 30 anos depois e casam. Mas não será fácil: ele tem oito filhos, ela dez e as famílias não se conseguem entender. Os filhos de Frank são disciplinados e os de Helen vivem sem regras, mas, agora, o casal cria um plano para que todos tenham de trabalhar em conjunto!

programme.title: O Coro
programme.desc: Um rapaz de órfão é enviado para uma escola de música. No entanto, ninguém suspeita que o seu comportamento solitário e rebelde esconde um enorme talento, que lhe permite ser o solista do coro, um grupo coral que concede a reputação e o prestigio à escola.

programme.title: The Mistletoe Secret
programme.desc: Aria Eubanks, proprietária do restaurante Mistletoe, é uma grande fã da estrela de aventuras Sterling Masters. Ela e o pai Mack descobrem que Masters vai escrever sobre todas as celebrações natalícias em Midway, Utah. Mas ela ainda não sabe que o seu escritor preferido não é aquilo que pensa.

programme.title: Small Town Christmas
programme.desc: A turné de um livro leva a autora de um bestseller de Natal à cidade do homem que a inspirou a escrever o livro, mas que também a magoou ao deixá-la pendurada.

programme.title: Deus Existe e Vive em Bruxelas
programme.desc: Deus existe! Vive em Bruxelas, é um estupor e maltrata a mulher e a filha. Sabemos muito do seu filho, mas pouco da filha. Chama-se Ea e tem 10 anos. Um dia, revolta-se contra o pai, entra no computador dele e revela a toda a gente o tempo que lhe resta.

programme.title: Quatro Casamentos e Um Funeral
programme.desc: Charlie é sempre o padrinho, mas nunca o noivo. Ele está determinado a evitar todo o tipo de compromissos, e chega sempre atrasado a todos os casamentos. Mas hoje, para sua surpresa, como se não bastasse já se ter esquecido das alianças... também vislumbrou a rapariga dos seus sonhos!

programme.title: Blue State
programme.desc: Comprometido em se mudar para o Canadá se John Kerry perder as eleições presidenciais dos EUA em 2004, o fervoroso liberal John Logue vê-se de repente sem trabalho, sem namorada e sem país! Cumprindo a promessa, Logue encontra uma companheira de viagem, a misteriosa Chloe, e segue para norte.

programme.title: O Lutador
programme.desc: A história verídica de Chuck Wepner, um pugilista de Nova Jérsia que ficou conhecido por ter levado Muhammad Ali ao tapete, no Campeonato Mundial de Pesos Pesados. Este combate levaria Chuck diretamente das ruas para ao estrelato.

programme.title: Cody Banks - Agente de Palmo e Meio
programme.desc: Para os amigos e para a família, Cody Banks é um adolescente típico. No entanto, Cody esconde um segredo: faz parte de um programa secreto da CIA para adolescentes.

programme.title: Christmas List
programme.desc: Isobel Gray planeia um conto de fadas natalício com o namorado, incluindo um chalé coberto de neve em Northwest e uma criteriosa lista de desejos das típicas tradições de Natal. Mas quando o namorado desaparece, a lista acaba por se tornar num desafio e um romance tentador vira a sua vida do avesso.

programme.title: Christmas List
programme.desc: Isobel Gray planeia um conto de fadas natalício com o namorado, incluindo um chalé coberto de neve em Northwest e uma criteriosa lista de desejos das típicas tradições de Natal. Mas quando o namorado desaparece, a lista acaba por se tornar num desafio e um romance tentador vira a sua vida do avesso.

programme.title: Morte Num Funeral
programme.desc: A cerimónia fúnebre de um pai de família é perturbada por uma série de incidentes, bem como pelas revelações de um desconhecido a propósito do defunto.

programme.title: Priscilla, Rainha do Deserto
programme.desc: Duas drag queens e uma mulher transgénero viajam para Alice Springs a fim de atuarem num casino. Para lá chegarem, compram um autocarro que batizam como "Priscilla", e passam por imensas peripécias na sua viagem.

programme.title: Grace: Sem Filtros
programme.desc: Aos 18 anos, Grace é uma cantora gospel de grande sucesso na sua igreja. Um dia, é convidada para tentar uma carreira de ídolo pop e ser a nova Katy Perry. Grace parte para Los Angeles, onde as suas crenças serão testadas no concorrido mundo do espetáculo.

programme.title: A Linguagem do Coração
programme.desc: Baseado na história verídica de Marie Heurtin. Ela nasceu surda e cega em França, no final do século XIX, e aos 14 anos é incapaz de comunicar. Contrariando o médico, os pais enviam-na para o Instituto Larnay, onde uma freira ensina Marie a expressar-se.

programme.title: Homem-Aranha: Longe de Casa
programme.desc: Peter Parker e os amigos estão de viagem à Europa. Apesar do entusiasmo inicial, eles não vão ter tempo para descansar. Peter tem de ajudar Nick Fury a desvendar o mistério por detrás das criaturas que têm provocado desastres e destruição pelo continente fora.

programme.title: MIB - Homens de Negro
programme.desc: Os agentes Jay e Kay fazem parte do segredo mais bem guardado do universo: MIB - Homens de Negro, uma agência governamental que oficialmente não existe e que controla as atividades extraterrestres na Terra.

programme.title: MIB - Homens de Negro II
programme.desc: Numa corrida contrarrelógio, Kay deverá convencer Jay a alistar-se de novo nos Homens de Negro antes que a Terra seja destruída. A dupla volta a unir-se para criar a melhor defesa contra o que poderá vir a ser o maior desafio de sempre: proteger a Terra da nova escória do Universo.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
Mentes Criminosas

programme.title: MIB: Homens de Negro - Força Internacional
programme.desc: Os Homens de Negro sempre protegeram a Terra da escória do Universo. Nesta nova aventura, eles enfrentam a maior ameaça de sempre: um infiltrado dentro da organização MIB.

programme.title: The Equalizer 2 - A Vingança
programme.desc: Robert McCall dedica os seus dias a fazer justiça, defendendo os fracos e oprimidos. Mas até onde irá Robert quando se trata de alguém que ama?

programme.title: Plano de Fuga
programme.desc: Ray Breslin, especialista em estruturas de segurança, aceita um desafio: fugir de uma instalação ultrassecreta e de alta tecnologia, "O Túmulo". Mas, uma vez prisioneiro, Breslin descobre que foi enganado e é considerado como um preso de verdade.

programme.title: Ghost In The Shell - Agente do Futuro
programme.desc: Num futuro próximo, Major é a primeira da sua espécie: um ser híbrido entre humano e ciborgue, concebida para ser o soldado perfeito e dedicada a parar os piores e mais perigosos criminosos no mundo.

programme.title: MIB - Homens de Negro
programme.desc: Os agentes Jay e Kay fazem parte do segredo mais bem guardado do universo: MIB - Homens de Negro, uma agência governamental que oficialmente não existe e que controla as atividades extraterrestres na Terra.
Em 480 A.C., o rei de Esparta enfrenta o poderoso exército persa no desfiladeiro das Termópilas. No entanto, uma traição ensombra a confiança cega dos gregos na vitória.

programme.title: Gotti - Um Verdadeiro Padrinho Americano
programme.desc: John Gotti enveredou cedo por uma vida de crime e, graças ao seu sangue frio e carisma, conseguiu ganhar estatuto e acabou como cabecilha dos Gambino, a mais poderosa família de mafiosos da América. Mas o seu filho não quer herdar o seu legado.

programme.title: Dois é uma Família
programme.desc: Samuel vive uma vida sem responsabilidades, quando se vê com uma filha bebé nos braços para cuidar. Oito anos mais tarde, os dois são inseparáveis, até que a mãe da criança vem quebrar esta harmonia, quando resolve reaparecer para recuperar a filha.

programme.title: Em Terra Selvagem
programme.desc: Um perito em artes marciais e defensor do ambiente luta contra uma grande empresa petrolífera.

programme.title: Força Anti-Crime
programme.desc: Los Angeles, 1949. Mickey Cohen, um impiedoso gangster, tem a cidade na sua mão. Contra um gangue protegido pela crescente corrupção, Bill Parker recruta o sargento John O'Mara, reunindo uma unidade especial para repor a justiça. As ordens não são para prender criminosos, mas sim iniciar uma guerra.

programme.title: Dick e Jane - Ladrões sem Jeito
programme.desc: Quando tudo parecia correr lindamente, Dick é despedido e, meses depois, a casa está hipotecada, a mulher vendeu o corpo à ciência e ele vive de biscates. Desesperado, o casal vira-se para o assalto à mão armada, com o plano de roubar aos ricos para dar aos pobres... ou seja, a eles próprios.

programme.title: Terra Chama Echo
programme.desc: Um grupo de amigos começa a receber mensagens estranhas nos telemóveis, mas os pais e as autoridades não dão importância a essas frases codificadas. Por sua conta e risco, os jovens embarcam numa aventura e descobrem um extraterrestre que precisa da sua ajuda.

programme.title: Um Polícia no Jardim-Escola
programme.desc: O agente da polícia Kimble, que conhece bem o seu ofício, tem uma missão à paisana que o converte no professor substituto de um jardim de infância. Agora, enfrentar 30 crianças sem qualquer preparação vai transformá-lo por completo!

programme.title: DragonHeart: Coração de Dragão
programme.desc: Nos tempos antigos, quando majestosos respiradores de fogo sobrevoavam os céus, Bowen fica face a face e coração a coração com o último dragão na Terra, Draco. Enquanto tenta travar um rei tirano, Bowen percebe que a tarefa será mais difícil do que imaginou: se matar o rei, Draco também morrerá.

programme.title: Super-Homem IV: Em Busca da Paz
programme.desc: Lex Luthor rouba de um museu um cabelo da cabeça do Super-Homem e usa-o para criar o Homem Nuclear, um androide que extrai a sua energia do Sol. O seu objetivo, claro, é usá-lo como arma para matar o Super-Homem, para que Luthor possa ficar livre para concretizar os seus planos maléficos.

programme.title: Para Além dos Limites
programme.desc: Michael é um vigarista ambicioso que elabora um plano para roubar um casino de luxo na Europa. No entanto, quando está prestes a alcançar o objetivo, encontra pela frente um enigmático rival e, misteriosamente, perde tudo vendo o seu plano desmascarado.

programme.title: Payback - A Vingança
programme.desc: O assalto foi fácil e o dinheiro estava no papo. Mas ao dividir os lucros, Val cometeu três erros: levou o dinheiro e a mulher de Porter, e tentou acabar com a vida do parceiro. Agora, Porter quer o dinheiro de volta e não interessa como o consegue. E não vai parar enquanto não tiver a sua vingança.

programme.title: Golpe de Amor
programme.desc: Um casal divorciado descobre que o dinheiro do seu plano de reforma foi roubado e concebe um plano para recuperá-lo. Os dois veem-se envolvidos numa perseguição por toda a Europa, num turbilhão de intrigas, perseguições loucas e roubos.

programme.title: Enquanto Somos Jovens
programme.desc: Josh e Cornelia formam um feliz casal de meia-idade, cuja vida se vai alterar depois de conhecerem Jamie e Darby, um jovem casal de espírito livre. Em pouco tempo, os quarentões colocam de parte os amigos da sua idade para seguirem estes jovens hipsters.

programme.title: Tudo a Nu Na Normandia
programme.desc: Numa localidade da Normandia, a crise afetou profundamente os rendimentos das famílias, mas ninguém consegue chamar a atenção do Governo. Quando um artista, famoso pelas suas fotografias de nus, ali passa, surge a oportunidade de dar nas vistas...

programme.title: Torque - A Lei do Mais Rápido
programme.desc: As motas são a vida de Cary Ford, mas agora podem ser a sua morte! O gangue "Os Reapers" persegue-o por um crime que não cometeu. Já o líder dos rivais "Hellions" quer apanhá-lo, bem como ao contrabando que julga que Ford lhe roubou. E também o FBI tem uma palavra a dizer...

programme.title: O Ben Está de Volta
programme.desc: Ben Burns é um jovem toxicodependente em tratamento, que regressa a casa, inesperadamente, na véspera de Natal. A mãe recebe-o de braços abertos, mas, durante 24 turbulentas horas, ela fará de tudo para evitar que Ben tenha uma recaída...

programme.title: Um Ano Muito Violento
programme.desc: Em Nova Iorque, o inverno de 1981 foi, estatisticamente, o ano mais perigoso na história da cidade. Neste contexto, um casal procura manter o seu negócio por entre o labirinto político e corrupção industrial das ruas de uma cidade em decadência.

programme.title: Jogos de Poder
programme.desc: A história verídica sobre um congressista texano, Charlie Wilson, com gosto para as bebidas e para as mulheres. Com a ajuda de um agente da CIA, com métodos pouco ortodoxos, a dupla financiou, sozinha, as guerrilhas afegãs nos anos 80, de modo a combater a invasão soviética do território.

programme.title: Soldado Milhões
programme.desc: Aníbal Augusto Milhais é um soldado português da Primeira Guerra Mundial. Na Batalha de La Lys, contrariando ordens superiores, enfrenta sozinho sucessivas ofensivas alemãs de maneira a garantir a retirada dos companheiros.

programme.title: O Mistério da Casa do Relógio
programme.desc: Lewis, de 10 anos, vai morar com o tio numa casa antiga, cheia de rangidos, onde ecoa o misterioso pulsar de um tiquetaque. Mas a cidade estremece com um mundo secreto de magos e bruxas, quando Lewis acorda acidentalmente os mortos.

programme.title: O Segurança do Shopping
programme.desc: Com um coração que nunca desiste, um estômago que não para de dar horas e a promessa de proteger o território: eis Paul Blart, o segurança do shopping. Quando um grupo de bandidos assume o controlo do centro comercial e faz reféns, cabe a Paul, que sempre quis ser polícia, a tarefa de salvar o dia.

programme.title: A Ilha das Cabeças Cortadas
programme.desc: Morgan, uma mulher dedicada à pirataria, herdou um barco, uma tripulação de bandidos e a terceira parte de um mapa que está escrito em latim. Para resolver o problema, compra um escravo educado e versado em latim, William Shaw, mas descobre que há mais alguém a seguir a pista do tesouro.

programme.title: Jogos de Poder
programme.desc: A história verídica sobre um congressista texano, Charlie Wilson, com gosto para as bebidas e para as mulheres. Com a ajuda de um agente da CIA, com métodos pouco ortodoxos, a dupla financiou, sozinha, as guerrilhas afegãs nos anos 80, de modo a combater a invasão soviética do território.

programme.title: Dois é uma Família
programme.desc: Samuel vive uma vida sem responsabilidades, quando se vê com uma filha bebé nos braços para cuidar. Oito anos mais tarde, os dois são inseparáveis, até que a mãe da criança vem quebrar esta harmonia, quando resolve reaparecer para recuperar a filha.

programme.title: Cowboys em Nova Iorque
programme.desc: Dois amigos de infância que são cowboys de rodeo viajam do Novo México até Nova Iorque em busca de um amigo que desapareceu enquanto procurava a filha, que foi levada ilegalmente de Cuba para os EUA.

programme.title: Submarino U-571
programme.desc: Durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial, a Marinha americana combate um submarino alemão com o intuito de lhes roubar um descodificador secreto.

programme.title: A Decisão Mortal
programme.desc: Anna e Tom querem começar uma família, mas vivem dificuldades económicas. Até ao dia em que descobrem o seu inquilino morto e um saco cheio de dinheiro em casa dele. Ao guardar segredo e ficar com o dinheiro, o casal torna-se um alvo a abater.

programme.title: Império
programme.desc: Victor quer escapar ao tráfico de drogas e deixa-se convencer por Jack, um jovem corretor, a investir na Bolsa de Wall Street. Este importante traficante acredita que esta é a sua derradeira oportunidade de vencer na vida, mas, depois de ser traído, não descansará enquanto não conseguir vingar-se...

programme.title: Mesmo a Tempo do Natal
programme.desc: Uma jovem professora de psicologia deve escolher entre percorrer todo o país para aceitar seu emprego dos sonhos ou permanecer em sua cidade natal para se casar com o seu homem ideal.

programme.title: O Natal de Eve
programme.desc: Uma gestora escolar interina é colocada numa situação difícil quando é encarregue de encerrar o programa musical falhado de uma escola e tem de enfrentar o seu passado musical.

programme.title: Melodia de Natal
programme.desc: O dom da música transporta as pessoas para outro tempo e lugar, onde descobrem os seus sentimentos mais verdadeiros. Um professor de música ajuda uma jovem recém-chegada à cidade a compor uma canção para o espetáculo de Natal da comunidade.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery: Homicídio, Com Amor
programme.desc: Hailey Dean, uma antiga procuradora do Ministério Público, é agora psicoterapeuta. Quando uma paciente sua é interrogada sobre as mortes repentinas dos seus pais, o antigo trabalho de Hailey revela-se útil para provar a sua inocência.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery: Herança Fatal
programme.desc: Hailey, uma antiga procuradora do Ministério Público, utiliza as suas competências e os seus contactos quando a sua amiga Pam desaparece enquanto tratava de vender a grande propriedade dos pais, já falecidos.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Toute Vérité N'Est Pas Bonne à Dire
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. programme.title: Mesmo a Tempo do Natal
programme.desc: Uma jovem professora de psicologia deve escolher entre percorrer todo o país para aceitar seu emprego dos sonhos ou permanecer em sua cidade natal para se casar com o seu homem ideal.

programme.title: Natal em Conway
programme.desc: Para surpreender a sua mulher, que precisa de cuidados médicos permanentes, Duncan Mayor quer colocar uma roda gigante no quintal de casa. Mas o seu vizinho bisbilhoteiro fará tudo para tentar impedi-lo.

programme.title: Murder, She Baked: Uma Receita Fatal
programme.desc: Hannah, dona de uma pastelaria, e a sua irmã encontram o cadáver do xerife. Hannah promete ao namorado e aspirante a detetive da Polícia que não se irá envolver, mas o marido da irmã está a concorrer às eleições para xerife, o que faz dele o principal suspeito e faz com que seja suspenso.

programme.title: Murder, She Baked: Apenas Sobremesas
programme.desc: Hannah Swensen fica felicíssima quando é convidada para o primeiro Concurso de Sobremesas de Eden Lake, mas quando outro membro do júri, o Treinador Boyd Watson, é encontrado assassinado, Hannah propõe-se mais uma vez a descobrir quem é o assassino.

programme.title: Amor de uma Vida
programme.desc: Ally, finalista num programa de encontros, tem de encarar o seu namorado do liceu quando é escolhida para um encontro na cidade onde nasceu.

programme.title: Caça ao Tesouro de Natal
programme.desc: Uma organizadora de eventos deita fora, por engano, os enfeites de Natal da avó, e a pessoa que os encontra leva-a numa caça ao tesouro para os recuperar, ajudando-a a reencontrar a magia do Natal.

programme.title: Uma Coroa Pelo Natal
programme.desc: Allie, uma funcionária despedida de um hotel luxuosa em Nova Iorque, aceita um novo emprego como governanta de uma jovem que faz parte de uma família poderosa na Europa.

programme.title: Money Monster
programme.desc: Lee Gates, um apresentador de televisão que é uma espécie de "guru" de Wall Street, é mantido refém com a sua equipa e produtora, durante a emissão do seu programa em direto, por um investidor irado. Em tempo real, terão de encontrar forma de se manterem vivos e desvendarem uma teia de mentiras.

programme.title: The Night Shift: Turno da Noite
The Night Shift: Turno da Noite
Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Toute Vérité N'Est Pas Bonne à Dire
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"denisvachon"},"dateCreated":"2018-09-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Funny police serie.","reviewBody":"Attaching characters, this police series is light and comic. Candice is a modern mom with an active love life. programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: C'Est Dans Le Malheur Qu'On Reconnait Ses Amis
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. programme.title: Um Doce Romance de Natal
programme.desc: Quando Holly, uma estilista de culinária, descobre que a dona da sua padaria preferida se vai reformar e promove um concurso para encontrar a sua sucessora, ela entra no concurso. Mas é obrigada a unir forças com um chef rival para tentar ganhar.

programme.title: Anjo Refilão
programme.desc: Allison Pyke transformou-se num anjo, mas ainda está presa na Terra, mais precisamente em Nova Iorque. Ela não sabe como entrar no Céu, mas terá a ajuda do seu "anjo mentor".

programme.title: Murder, She Baked: Apenas Sobremesas
programme.desc: Hannah Swensen fica felicíssima quando é convidada para o primeiro Concurso de Sobremesas de Eden Lake, mas quando outro membro do júri, o Treinador Boyd Watson, é encontrado assassinado, Hannah propõe-se mais uma vez a descobrir quem é o assassino.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery: Homicídio, Com Amor
programme.desc: Hailey Dean, uma antiga procuradora do Ministério Público, é agora psicoterapeuta. Quando uma paciente sua é interrogada sobre as mortes repentinas dos seus pais, o antigo trabalho de Hailey revela-se útil para provar a sua inocência.

programme.title: Natal em Nashville
programme.desc: Quando Rebecca Miller regressa a casa, ao Tennesse, duas semanas antes do Natal, a última coisa que esperava era rever o seu melhor amigo de infância.

programme.title: A Ajudante do Pai Natal
programme.desc: Holly regressa a casa para o Natal e vai trabalhar como duende na loja da família, onde conhece o Pai Natal substituto e se apaixona inesperadamente.

Big Al fez inúmeros inimigos ao longo da vida, mas nenhum mais perigoso do que a sua grande paixão, Kat. Os dois vivem do crime, do tráfico de armas e de assaltos, mas Kat quer mais e começa a vender armas, entrando num mundo novo e do qual Big Al não faz parte.

programme.title: Sorte Malvada
programme.desc: Dois irmãos irlandeses devem dinheiro a um mafioso mas quando chegam a acordo sobre a forma de pagar a dívida, tudo dá para o torto e eles veem-se forçados a proteger uma adolescente em perigo ao mesmo tempo que são perseguidos por assassinos contratados.

programme.title: Derradeira Viagem
programme.desc: Trinta anos após servirem juntos no Vietname, um grupo de ex-colegas reencontra-se. Um antigo enfermeiro da Marinha reúne-se com dois velhos amigos fuzileiros, Sal Nealon e o agora Reverendo Richard Mueller, para enterrar o seu filho, um jovem fuzileiro morto na guerra do Iraque.

programme.title: Comportem-se Como Adultos
programme.desc: Grécia 2015: a economia está no caos e o país à beira da bancarrota. Um novo governo revolta-se contra as regras restritivas da União Europeia e inspira milhões de europeus. O Ministro das Finanças grego, Yanis Varoufakis, vai ser o protagonista desse combate.

programme.title: O Medalhão
programme.desc: O detetive Eddie Yang sofre um acidente e morre, mas volta à vida com a ajuda de um medalhão, que dá poderes sobrenaturais ao seu detentor. Em conjunto com uma agente da Interpol, Eddie vai tentar descobrir os segredos do artefacto e derrotar o malvado "Cabeça de Cobra".

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Longfellow Deeds, um rapaz da província, chega à cidade de Manhattan para receber uma herança de 40 biliões de dólares que lhe deixou um tio afastado. A vida do milionário "simples" corre bem e, com a ajuda do seu mordomo, Deeds anda divertido a descobrir um mundo novo.

programme.title: O Amor é Um Lugar Estranho
programme.desc: Bob é uma estrela de cinema a rodar um anúncio, Charlotte uma jovem que viaja com o marido, um fotógrafo viciado em trabalho. São os dois norte-americanos, mas cruzam-se no bar de um hotel em Tóquio. E de um encontro fortuito vai nascer uma forte amizade...

programme.title: A Arte da Guerra: Traição
programme.desc: Reformado ao fim de uma carreira irrepreensível, o agente Neil Shaw vê-se subitamente envolvido num estranho e secreto plano para assassinar vários senadores.

programme.title: Grey Owl - A História de um Guerreiro
programme.desc: O britânico Archibald Belaney cresceu de tal forma fascinado com a cultura dos índios norte-americanos que, quando deixou o seu país e foi viver para o Canadá, se reinventou como Archie Grey Owl. Ali, viveu como nativo americano e tornou-se um ambientalista convicto.

programme.title: Águas Perigosas
programme.desc: Nancy está sozinha numa praia isolada a fazer surf. Atacada por um tubarão, refugia-se num rochedo, a 200 metros da costa. Para salvar-se, terá de recorrer a todos os seus recursos e vontade, para ultrapassar o enorme tubarão branco.

programme.title: Inferno Vermelho
programme.desc: O inexpressivo agente russo Ivan Danko persegue um traficante de droga de Moscovo a Chicago, onde faz parceria com o agente Art Ridzik, cuja ética profissional é bastante mais relaxada.

programme.title: Debate Pela Liberdade
programme.desc: A história verídica de Melvin B. Tolson, um professor da Wiley College, no Texas, que em 1935 inspirou os seus estudantes a formarem a primeira equipa de debate daquela faculdade de alunos negros, que acabou por desafiar a mais prestigiada Harvard no campeonato nacional.

programme.title: Roman J. Israel, Esq.
programme.desc: Roman Israel é um advogado idealista que faz de tudo por um julgamento justo. Mas quando é demitido, aceita o convite de outra firma, com a promessa de uma vida de luxo. No entanto, Israel descobre um esquema de bastidores que precisa de medidas extremas...

programme.title: The Operative - Agente Infiltrada
programme.desc: Contratada pela Mossad como agente infiltrada no Teerão, Rachel passa por professora de inglês e traça a sua missão: aceder à empresa de produtos eletrónicos e intermediar a venda de componentes nucleares defeituosos aos Serviços Secretos Iranianos.

programme.title: Operações Especiais
programme.desc: Um agente veterano e o seu parceiro são destacados para uma prisão. Ali, têm de supervisionar a chegada de duas misteriosas prisioneiras, mas, quando o local é atacado por mercenários, os agentes descobrem a verdadeira identidade daquelas duas mulheres.

programme.title: The Contractor
programme.desc: Atarefada a remodelar a casa com o marido e a filha, Elizabeth contrata um empreiteiro, Javier, para a ajudar. Mas com o correr do tempo ela começa a suspeitar que ele tem uma agenda escondida e que já tinha a família na mira há bastante tempo.

programme.title: Devota Com Pouca Sorte
programme.desc: Carmen Ruano dedicou toda a sua vida à confraria de Nossa Senhora de Santa Cruz da Caridade e da Esperança. Agora que o presidente da confraria se vai reformar, surge a oportunidade perfeita para tomar as rédeas e mostrar o seu valor. Mas nem tudo corre de feição...

programme.title: O Amor é Um Lugar Estranho
programme.desc: Bob é uma estrela de cinema a rodar um anúncio, Charlotte uma jovem que viaja com o marido, um fotógrafo viciado em trabalho. São os dois norte-americanos, mas cruzam-se no bar de um hotel em Tóquio. E de um encontro fortuito vai nascer uma forte amizade...

programme.title: Happy Feet (V.P.)
programme.desc: Na Antártida, no mundo dos pinguins, os animais encontram a sua alma gémea através de canções. No entanto, um deles nasceu sem a habilidade vocal... mas dança sapateado como ninguém!

programme.title: Cinema Paraíso
programme.desc: Depois de saber da morte de um velho amigo, o cineasta Salvatore Di Vita recorda a sua infância e adolescência na Sicília. Na altura, "Totò" vivia fascinado pela cabina mágica de Alfredo, o mal-humorado projecionista do cinema da vila: o Cinema Paraíso.

programme.title: Inferno Vermelho
programme.desc: O inexpressivo agente russo Ivan Danko persegue um traficante de droga de Moscovo a Chicago, onde faz parceria com o agente Art Ridzik, cuja ética profissional é bastante mais relaxada.

programme.title: Jogo de Espiões
programme.desc: Um operativo da CIA, Nathan Muir, está prestes a reformar-se quando descobre que o seu protegido, Tom Bishop, foi preso na China por espionagem. Nada estranho aos mecanismos de funcionamento da CIA, Muir enceta todos os esforços para libertar Bishop.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim Contra o Mundo
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim é um rapaz de 22 anos que toca numa banda. Ele acaba de conhecer a rapariga dos seus sonhos, Ramona Flowers. O único entrave para ganhar o seu coração? Os sete maléficos ex-namorados preparados para o matar, que terá de enfrentar.

programme.title: O Medalhão
programme.desc: O detetive Eddie Yang sofre um acidente e morre, mas volta à vida com a ajuda de um medalhão, que dá poderes sobrenaturais ao seu detentor. Em conjunto com uma agente da Interpol, Eddie vai tentar descobrir os segredos do artefacto e derrotar o malvado "Cabeça de Cobra".

programme.title: Escola para Totós
programme.desc: Um jovem muito inseguro resolve entrar num curso para aumentar a sua determinação e autoestima e conseguir declarar-se a Amanda, só que tudo se torna mais complicado quando o próprio professor lhe vai fazer concorrência na conquista dos afetos da rapariga.

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: Jon Martello é um tipo de Nova Jérsia que se importa com o seu corpo, a família, os amigos, a sua igreja e, claro, mulheres. Os amigos até o tratam por Don Jon. Insatisfeito, embarca numa jornada em busca de uma vida sexual mais gratificante.

programme.title: John Wick 3 - Implacável
programme.desc: Na continuação da saga, o super-assassino John Wick regressa em fuga e com a cabeça a prémio pelo valor de 14 milhões de dólares. Atrás de si está montada uma autêntica caça ao homem e há vários assassinos que querem a recompensa a qualquer custo.

programme.title: Homem em Fúria
programme.desc: Na Cidade do México, um antigo fuzileiro vai dar o tudo por tudo para se vingar dos responsáveis pelo rapto da menina de nove anos que ele foi contratado para proteger.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
CSI: Crime Sob Investigação
programme.desc: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Created by Anthony E. Zuiker. With George Eads, Eric Szmanda, Robert David Hall, Paul Guilfoyle. Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kidcurry1967"},"dateCreated":"2000-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Outstanding!!!","reviewBody":"C.S.I. is the best new show of the 2000 season! William L. Petersen is the coolest of the cool as Gil Grissom. I've followed his career since I first saw him in To Live and Die in L.A. He's an amazing actor and he heads up a cast of amazing actors as well. This show really keeps you on the edge of your seat as the investigators literally take a crime scene that appears to leave them with nothing to go on. The investigators take nothing and turn it into something amazing as each crime is solved right in front of you and you as the viewer, never see it coming! Wow! William L. Petersen is the coolest of the cool as Gil Grissom. I've followed his career since I first saw him in To Live and Die in L.A. He's an amazing actor and he heads up a cast of amazing actors as well. This show really keeps you on the edge of your seat as the investigators literally take a crime scene that appears to leave them with nothing to go on. The investigators take nothing and turn it into something amazing as each crime is solved right in front of you and you as the viewer, never see it coming! Wow! programme.title: MacGyver
MacGyver
programme.sub-title: Royalty + Marriage + Vivaah Sanskar + Zinc + Henna
programme.desc:
MacGyver: Created by Lee David Zlotoff, Peter M. Lenkov, Paul Downs Colaizzo, Brett Mahoney. With Lucas Till, Tristin Mays, Justin Hires, Meredith Eaton. Young Angus "Mac" MacGyver works for a clandestine organization within the U.S. government, relying on his unconventional problem-solving skills to save lives." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1399045/","name":"MacGyver","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg1NzUzNmQtMWI2ZC00YzdlLWI5ZTgtMGM3MjJlZTgwYTVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTIzMzY2NDQ2._V1_.jpg","description":"Young Angus "Mac" MacGyver works for a clandestine organization within the U.S. government, relying on his unconventional problem-solving skills to save lives.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1399045/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nakrugt"},"dateCreated":"2021-10-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just finished watching the show","reviewBody":"Currently watching Season 3 Episode 17, and I have not made up my mind yet.

First off, things I like:

On-screen titles: They are hilarious, to be honest. You should read them. Each and every one of them.

Characters: To be honest, MacGyver in this version is much more likeable. In the 1980s version, he was too arrogant to like. The team (just like the Team Flash) is nice to watch.

Self-awareness: The producers, the cast and the writers do not take themselves too seriously. So, it is fun to watch.

Things I do not like: the science, the convenient ingredients for everything, characters too fast to forgive others.

I will finish the series, though.

Edit: I finished the show.

I hope PrimeVideo or Netflix would pick up the show in the future for 10-episode seasons with a proper finale.

Also, I liked each and every cameo form the cast of LOST; Jin, Ethan, Naomi, the lady that got shot by Mikhail, and, of course, Hurley. I especially hoped that Hurley would say goodbye "see you in another life, brotha!" to Desmond, but he didn't.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20051,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-09-23","keywords":"character name as series title,surname as series title,one word series title,urban adventure,timeframe 2010s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1395771/","name":"Lucas Till"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1159702/","name":"Tristin Mays"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2058713/","name":"Justin Hires"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0314692/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0504531/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0173285/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0957453/","name":"Lee David Zlotoff"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006997/","name":"Peter M. programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc:
CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"eamon-hennedy"},"dateCreated":"2003-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as original, but still worth watching.","reviewBody":"Spin-off shows are very strange television projects. In some cases they work, like Angel which has become a show of its own. On the other hand the Star Trek spin-offs (more so the later ones) have becoming mere clones of the show they have spawned from. It is difficult to make it work. You can try and be different and the fan base from the originating show could hate you. Be too similar and the counter effect it that many will call it nothing but a clone. While CSI:Miami is more or less the same show as CSI:Crime Scene Investigation it is still a series that is well worth watching and most of it is down to the reasons that the originating series was worth watching. Fantastic writing, feature film production values and a good cast. While in Crime Scene Investigation the casting is first class here were are merely in good territory. The cast here don't seem to share the same chemistry as Grissom and friends, although whether or not this is deliberate I'm not sure.

With regards to casting what they do have in common is a superb central male lead. David Caruso is a fine actor, was so in the first season of NYPD Blue. Here he is incredible. Unlike Grissom, Horatio Crane (the best name ever for the main character in a television show) is more speculative, he will be more open to hunches than just considering the evidence. The manner in which is delivers his dialog is controlled mannered. If Grissom is the Fox Mulder of CSI, then Crane is undoubtedly the Frank Black. The supporting actors themselves are very good. Kim Delaney was watchable if a little too glossy while former West Wing actress Emily Procter once again brings a wealth of quirky charm that she likewise did with Ainsley in the White House drama.

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Zuiker"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"CSI: Miami: Complete Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi320379929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for CSI: Miami - Complete Season 08"}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0313043, Title: CSI: Miami, --- Description: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"eamon-hennedy","dateCreated":"2003-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as original, but still worth watching.","reviewBody":"Spin-off shows are very strange television projects. In some cases they work, like Angel which has become a show of its own. On the other hand the Star Trek spin-offs (more so the later ones) have becoming mere clones of the show they have spawned from. It is difficult to make it work. You can try and be different and the fan base from the originating show could hate you. Be too similar and the counter effect it that many will call it nothing but a clone. While CSI:Miami is more or less the same show as CSI:Crime Scene Investigation it is still a series that is well worth watching and most of it is down to the reasons that the originating series was worth watching. Fantastic writing, feature film production values and a good cast. While in Crime Scene Investigation the casting is first class here were are merely in good territory. The cast here don't seem to share the same chemistry as Grissom and friends, although whether or not this is deliberate I'm not sure.

With regards to casting what they do have in common is a superb central male lead. David Caruso is a fine actor, was so in the first season of NYPD Blue. Here he is incredible. Unlike Grissom, Horatio Crane (the best name ever for the main character in a television show) is more speculative, he will be more open to hunches than just considering the evidence. The manner in which is delivers his dialog is controlled mannered. If Grissom is the Fox Mulder of CSI, then Crane is undoubtedly the Frank Black. The supporting actors themselves are very good. Kim Delaney was watchable if a little too glossy while former West Wing actress Emily Procter once again brings a wealth of quirky charm that she likewise did with Ainsley in the White House drama.

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kidcurry1967"},"dateCreated":"2000-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Outstanding!!!","reviewBody":"C.S.I. is the best new show of the 2000 season! William L. Petersen is the coolest of the cool as Gil Grissom. I've followed his career since I first saw him in To Live and Die in L.A. He's an amazing actor and he heads up a cast of amazing actors as well. This show really keeps you on the edge of your seat as the investigators literally take a crime scene that appears to leave them with nothing to go on. The investigators take nothing and turn it into something amazing as each crime is solved right in front of you and you as the viewer, never see it coming! Wow! I hope this is one show CBS will pick up year after year!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":81434,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"eamon-hennedy"},"dateCreated":"2003-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as original, but still worth watching.","reviewBody":"Spin-off shows are very strange television projects. In some cases they work, like Angel which has become a show of its own. On the other hand the Star Trek spin-offs (more so the later ones) have becoming mere clones of the show they have spawned from. It is difficult to make it work. You can try and be different and the fan base from the originating show could hate you. Be too similar and the counter effect it that many will call it nothing but a clone. While CSI:Miami is more or less the same show as CSI:Crime Scene Investigation it is still a series that is well worth watching and most of it is down to the reasons that the originating series was worth watching. Fantastic writing, feature film production values and a good cast. While in Crime Scene Investigation the casting is first class here were are merely in good territory. The cast here don't seem to share the same chemistry as Grissom and friends, although whether or not this is deliberate I'm not sure.

With regards to casting what they do have in common is a superb central male lead. David Caruso is a fine actor, was so in the first season of NYPD Blue. Here he is incredible. Unlike Grissom, Horatio Crane (the best name ever for the main character in a television show) is more speculative, he will be more open to hunches than just considering the evidence. The manner in which is delivers his dialog is controlled mannered. If Grissom is the Fox Mulder of CSI, then Crane is undoubtedly the Frank Black. The supporting actors themselves are very good. Kim Delaney was watchable if a little too glossy while former West Wing actress Emily Procter once again brings a wealth of quirky charm that she likewise did with Ainsley in the White House drama.

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. IMDb data; ttnr: 0313043, Title: CSI: Miami, --- Description: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"eamon-hennedy","dateCreated":"2003-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as original, but still worth watching.","reviewBody":"Spin-off shows are very strange television projects. In some cases they work, like Angel which has become a show of its own. On the other hand the Star Trek spin-offs (more so the later ones) have becoming mere clones of the show they have spawned from. It is difficult to make it work. You can try and be different and the fan base from the originating show could hate you. Be too similar and the counter effect it that many will call it nothing but a clone. While CSI:Miami is more or less the same show as CSI:Crime Scene Investigation it is still a series that is well worth watching and most of it is down to the reasons that the originating series was worth watching. Fantastic writing, feature film production values and a good cast. While in Crime Scene Investigation the casting is first class here were are merely in good territory. The cast here don't seem to share the same chemistry as Grissom and friends, although whether or not this is deliberate I'm not sure.

With regards to casting what they do have in common is a superb central male lead. David Caruso is a fine actor, was so in the first season of NYPD Blue. Here he is incredible. Unlike Grissom, Horatio Crane (the best name ever for the main character in a television show) is more speculative, he will be more open to hunches than just considering the evidence. The manner in which is delivers his dialog is controlled mannered. If Grissom is the Fox Mulder of CSI, then Crane is undoubtedly the Frank Black. The supporting actors themselves are very good. Kim Delaney was watchable if a little too glossy while former West Wing actress Emily Procter once again brings a wealth of quirky charm that she likewise did with Ainsley in the White House drama.

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Zuiker"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"CSI: Miami: Complete Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi320379929","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for CSI: Miami - Complete Season 08"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Sam Hill, Joe Chappelle, Scott Lautanen, Karen Gaviola, Matt Earl Beesley

CSI: Vegas
programme.desc: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Created by Anthony E. Zuiker. With George Eads, Eric Szmanda, Robert David Hall, Paul Guilfoyle. Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kidcurry1967"},"dateCreated":"2000-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Outstanding!!!","reviewBody":"C.S.I. is the best new show of the 2000 season! William L. Petersen is the coolest of the cool as Gil Grissom. I've followed his career since I first saw him in To Live and Die in L.A. He's an amazing actor and he heads up a cast of amazing actors as well. This show really keeps you on the edge of your seat as the investigators literally take a crime scene that appears to leave them with nothing to go on. The investigators take nothing and turn it into something amazing as each crime is solved right in front of you and you as the viewer, never see it coming! Wow! I hope this is one show CBS will pick up year after year!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":81434,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. programme.title: O Regresso de Johnny English
programme.desc: Desaparecido do mapa, o agente de topo do MI7 esteve a apurar as suas capacidades únicas numa região remota da Ásia. No entanto, quando os seus superiores da agência são informados de uma tentativa de assassinato ao primeiro-ministro chinês, têm de recuperar o pouco ortodoxo agente!

programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc:
CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"eamon-hennedy"},"dateCreated":"2003-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as original, but still worth watching.","reviewBody":"Spin-off shows are very strange television projects. In some cases they work, like Angel which has become a show of its own. On the other hand the Star Trek spin-offs (more so the later ones) have becoming mere clones of the show they have spawned from. It is difficult to make it work. You can try and be different and the fan base from the originating show could hate you. Be too similar and the counter effect it that many will call it nothing but a clone. While CSI:Miami is more or less the same show as CSI:Crime Scene Investigation it is still a series that is well worth watching and most of it is down to the reasons that the originating series was worth watching. Fantastic writing, feature film production values and a good cast. While in Crime Scene Investigation the casting is first class here were are merely in good territory. The cast here don't seem to share the same chemistry as Grissom and friends, although whether or not this is deliberate I'm not sure.

With regards to casting what they do have in common is a superb central male lead. David Caruso is a fine actor, was so in the first season of NYPD Blue. Here he is incredible. Unlike Grissom, Horatio Crane (the best name ever for the main character in a television show) is more speculative, he will be more open to hunches than just considering the evidence. The manner in which is delivers his dialog is controlled mannered. If Grissom is the Fox Mulder of CSI, then Crane is undoubtedly the Frank Black. The supporting actors themselves are very good. Kim Delaney was watchable if a little too glossy while former West Wing actress Emily Procter once again brings a wealth of quirky charm that she likewise did with Ainsley in the White House drama.

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Zuiker"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"CSI: Miami: Complete Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi320379929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for CSI: Miami - Complete Season 08"}}</script><metacontent="

What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc:
CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"eamon-hennedy"},"dateCreated":"2003-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as original, but still worth watching.","reviewBody":"Spin-off shows are very strange television projects. In some cases they work, like Angel which has become a show of its own. On the other hand the Star Trek spin-offs (more so the later ones) have becoming mere clones of the show they have spawned from. It is difficult to make it work. You can try and be different and the fan base from the originating show could hate you. Be too similar and the counter effect it that many will call it nothing but a clone. While CSI:Miami is more or less the same show as CSI:Crime Scene Investigation it is still a series that is well worth watching and most of it is down to the reasons that the originating series was worth watching. Fantastic writing, feature film production values and a good cast. While in Crime Scene Investigation the casting is first class here were are merely in good territory. The cast here don't seem to share the same chemistry as Grissom and friends, although whether or not this is deliberate I'm not sure.

With regards to casting what they do have in common is a superb central male lead. David Caruso is a fine actor, was so in the first season of NYPD Blue. Here he is incredible. Unlike Grissom, Horatio Crane (the best name ever for the main character in a television show) is more speculative, he will be more open to hunches than just considering the evidence. The manner in which is delivers his dialog is controlled mannered. If Grissom is the Fox Mulder of CSI, then Crane is undoubtedly the Frank Black. The supporting actors themselves are very good. Kim Delaney was watchable if a little too glossy while former West Wing actress Emily Procter once again brings a wealth of quirky charm that she likewise did with Ainsley in the White House drama.

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Zuiker"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"CSI: Miami: Complete Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi320379929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for CSI: Miami - Complete Season 08"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Created by Anthony E. Zuiker. With George Eads, Eric Szmanda, Robert David Hall, Paul Guilfoyle. Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kidcurry1967"},"dateCreated":"2000-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Outstanding!!!","reviewBody":"C.S.I. is the best new show of the 2000 season! William L. Petersen is the coolest of the cool as Gil Grissom. I've followed his career since I first saw him in To Live and Die in L.A. He's an amazing actor and he heads up a cast of amazing actors as well. This show really keeps you on the edge of your seat as the investigators literally take a crime scene that appears to leave them with nothing to go on. The investigators take nothing and turn it into something amazing as each crime is solved right in front of you and you as the viewer, never see it coming! Wow! I hope this is one show CBS will pick up year after year!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":81434,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. William L. Petersen is the coolest of the cool as Gil Grissom. I've followed his career since I first saw him in To Live and Die in L.A. He's an amazing actor and he heads up a cast of amazing actors as well. This show really keeps you on the edge of your seat as the investigators literally take a crime scene that appears to leave them with nothing to go on. The investigators take nothing and turn it into something amazing as each crime is solved right in front of you and you as the viewer, never see it coming! Wow! I hope this is one show CBS will pick up year after year!","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":81434,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E.
